channel.title: Error
channel.description:
I get this error when trying to pickup one of my items...
[code]Thank you for using the Retribution V2.1 Client! Enjoy the game! Playing A Waking The Demon.mp3 Exception in thread "Thread-8" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14931 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:127) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:7481) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:7353) at client.method105(client.java:8170) at client.method36(client.java:1585) at client.method102(client.java:7879) at client.method9(client.java:8762) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:123) at client.run(client.java:4588) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
Any help? It's a custom added model...

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Fixed it, lol. Cannot have model ID’s over 14931 for my client apparently…

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Setsuna:

Any help? It’s a custom added model…

The item is either too big to load or incorrectly made. Refer back to the model itself.

Read full topic
